message: Let's make a deal Bob. This offer is a good deal for you now, but it will be worse with each round!
I think this is more fair.  The value decreases for both of us as we go on.
Bob, this is the last round where your offer will be worth more than mine. Let's be reasonable and end this here.
Alice, this is my last offer. It's clear we won't reach a deal where I get more than half, but this is the lowest I'll go.
